body: Vogelsang is a leading manufacturer of rotary lobe pumps, macerators and land application technology for the municipal, industrial and agricultural markets. Over 80 years ago the founders of our company tried to understand the wishes of our customers and they based their strategy on the collaborative thinking and on the continuous research and development of new ideas, and today we are following the same way.In order to strength the company position on the regional market, and to support its objectives, we are looking a qualified person in the position of area sales engineer for Transilvania - Banat area of Romania.Main responsibilities:To develop the customers portfolio in the assigned area by identifying all the important opportunities on the market;To prepare the quotations, to negotiate and finalize the deals; to follow-up the contracts;To provide technical and sales support and the start-up procedures;To participate to the marketing activities (presentations, fairs, technical conferences);To make regular reports to the Managing Director;Requirements:University degree in Mechanics, Hydraulic or Energetic domain;2-3 years experience in sales, preferably in industrial/water domain;Excellent technical knowledge;Fluent in English - written and spoken (mandatory);Excellent communication skills;Willing to travel extensively (mandatory)Clean driving licence (mandatory)BenefitsCompetitive salary package;Company car;Mobile phone and laptop;
title: AREA SALES MANAGER
